definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她們都穿着最昂貴的衣服，留着長長的美麗的鬈髮。

sentences.english: Women do phonological processing with both their right and left inferior frontal gyri .
sentences.chinese: 女人是利用她們左右眉骨後的側腦回發音的。

sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她們如同寡婦被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: To his family, their guilt, to work, but no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 對家人，她們心存內疚，對工作，卻無怨無悔。

sentences.english: They know, real intentions namely every human all has difficult speech here.
sentences.chinese: 她們只知道，這裏的每一個人都有難言的苦衷。

sentences.english: The girls prattled about their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘們閒聊着她們的服裝。

sentences.english: But neither girl by word or gesture revealed her blankness.
sentences.chinese: 但是沒有一個姑娘用說話或者手勢來表達她們的惆悵。

sentences.english: But we need to make them realistic.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們需要讓她們變得現實起來。

sentences.english: They were nearly four times as likely to live long after bypass surgery as were the unmarried.
sentences.chinese: 她們搭橋手術後的存活率幾乎是未婚者的4倍。

sentences.english: Others are predators. Deviously setting traps to get what they want.
sentences.chinese: 還有些是獵人，迂迴設陷得到她們想要的。

sentences.english: They said I looked like only injured the cat quiet, blissful silence only to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她們說我象只安靜受傷的貓，不言不語只睡覺。

sentences.english: Because of the nature of their depravity.
sentences.chinese: 是因爲她們本性的墮落。

sentences.english: They must all go to Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 誰叫她們不到白利屯往。

sentences.english: When the women reached age 40, Leupp measured their levels of depression .
sentences.chinese: 等到她們40歲時，萊普分別測試她們的抑鬱程度。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
